title: Selected Works
explanation: Here you'll find a selection of projects that represent my journey as a web developer with more than three years of experience. This portfolio includes both freelance work and collaborations with companies, all centered around modern front-end and CMS development. My focus areas include React, JavaScript, Sass, WordPress (including custom theme development with PHP), and headless CMS architecture. Each project reflects my commitment to building responsive, user-friendly, and technically solid digital experiences.

projects.name: Vansun Studio Website
projects.alt: Screenshot of Vansun Studio booking website
projects.shortDescription: A fully custom booking website for a piercing and tattoo studio, built from scratch with React and WordPress headless CMS.
projects.overview: Vansun Studio is a fully responsive, feature-rich booking platform for a Vancouver-based tattoo and piercing studio. The website is built entirely from scratch, integrating a custom-built React frontend with WordPress as a headless CMS and WooCommerce for appointment handling. It includes advanced features such as a consent form, custom booking logic, and smooth animations to enhance user experience.

Technologies: React: Used for creating reusable and dynamic UI components.
WordPress Headless CMS: Provides content management via REST API.
WooCommerce: Manages booking products and handles checkout processes.
ACF (Advanced Custom Fields): Powers dynamic availability per service.
SASS: Enables scalable and modular styling.
Framer Motion: Adds smooth and modern UI animations.
Features: Custom Booking System: Fully developed booking workflow with availability slots, connected directly to WooCommerce products.
Consent Form Integration: A digital consent form tailored for the studio’s service flow.
Admin-Friendly CMS: Studio content, services, and availability managed easily via WordPress backend.
Responsive & Mobile-First: Optimized UX for all screen sizes.
Enhanced Animations: Clean transitions and hover effects enhance the feel.
SEO & Performance: Optimized loading speed and metadata for search engines.
Contributions: Designed and developed the entire project from scratch, from UX/UI to full functionality.
Wrote all frontend and backend integration logic using React and REST API calls.
Built WooCommerce booking logic, including custom functions for availability and validation.
Integrated ACF for dynamic service time slots and synced it with React UI components.
Implemented a custom digital consent form workflow integrated into the booking system.
Handled full deployment and post-launch updates, ensuring performance and stability.

projects.name: Redtattoo
projects.alt: Screenshot of Mahdi Roozbahani's portfolio website
projects.shortDescription: A modern and responsive portfolio website built with React to showcase projects and skills.
projects.overview: Red Tattoo is a custom-built website designed for a tattoo studio, functioning as both an online portfolio and a booking platform. The site allows potential customers to browse past work, learn more about the artist, book appointments, and complete payments seamlessly — all in one place. It's crafted to reflect the unique style of the artist while offering a smooth and modern user experience.

Technologies: CMS: WordPress 6.8
E-commerce: WooCommerce 9.4.1
JavaScript Frameworks & Libraries: Svelte, jQuery, jQuery UI, jQuery Migrate
Styling & UI: Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap Icons, Google Font API
Backend & Logic: PHP
Database: MySQL
Hosting: SiteGround
Features: Custom WordPress theme tailored to the tattoo studio's branding
Portfolio section to showcase artwork
Appointment booking system with calendar and time slot integration (Bookly)
E-commerce functionality via WooCommerce for deposits and payment processing
Fully responsive design, mobile-optimized
Contributions: Designed and developed a custom WordPress theme from scratch
Implemented both frontend and backend logic using PHP
Integrated WooCommerce for payments and Bookly for appointment scheduling
Handled database structure and optimization (MySQL)
Customized plugin behavior for specific client needs
Ensured the site is SEO-ready and performance-tuned
Provided post-launch support and documentation
